sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - தட்டு, சிதறப்பண்ணு, அடி, மூடு, தகடாக்கப்படு, விரி, பரப்பு
to beat, to stamp, to beat out, to spread out, to stretch
b) (Piel) to overlay, to beat out (for plating)
d) (Hiphil) to make a spreading (used of clouds)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to pound the earth (as a sign of passion); by analogy to expand (by hammering); by implication to overlay (with thin sheets of metal): - beat, make broad, spread abroad (forth, over, out, into plates), stamp, stretch.
Cognate: H7549, H7554, H7555
